attributes.action: To ban the use and implementation of Vaccine passports.
attributes.additional_details: We believe that the civil liberties granted to us in Great Britain and Northern Ireland extend to all citizens and that the government should not deduct said liberties from any individual wishing to exercise their medical rights by refusing the COVID-19 vaccine.
attributes.background: This petition seeks to halt all government implementations of restrictions of civil liberties for any individual within the United Kingdom who has not been vaccinated.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
